memory.summarizer_summary:
Inkers.ai provides AI-powered solutions for the construction industry. Their key products and services include:

**Core Features:**

*   **4D BIM (BIM with Timelines):** Integrates the construction process with 2D and 3D measurements linked to project timelines for detailed documentation and progress tracking.
*   **Snag List:** Highlights clashes and deviations using color-coded 3D textures and AI-powered snag lists.
*   **Project Milestones:** Automates tracking of deliverables, quantities, timelines, and traceability.
*   **Scan to BIM:** Converts point cloud data into Revit models.
*   **Thermals Analytics:** Incorporates thermal texture models to analyze moisture levels.
*   **Deviation Analysis:** Compares as-built 3D models with BIM designs.

**Next Generation Construction AI:**

*   **Defects AI:** Detects 15 construction defects in real-time.
*   **Mesh Segmentation AI:** Segments meshes into 10 IFC classes.
*   **Objects AI:** Identifies over 35 site objects.
*   **Health & Safety AI:** Uses facial recognition for real-time attendance, safety, and unknown person reports.

**Other Features:**

*   **Automated Milestones and Scheduling:** Tracks, manages, and executes construction projects.
*   **Real-time Tracking:** Monitors construction progress with automated milestone tracking.
*   **Smart Scheduling:** AI-powered scheduling optimization.
*   **BIM Integration:** Integrates with existing BIM models.
*   **Analytics Dashboard:** Provides analytics and insights for data-driven decisions.

Inkers.ai offers tiered pricing plans for Owners & Contractors, Architects, and Lithic Scanner, with options for Lite, Basic, and Plus packages.

nodes.description: Open inkers.ai in a new tab and save browser snapshot.
Click on the 'Demo' button using element ID from the snapshot.
Get comprehensive markdown of the page after clicking the Demo button.
Summarize the products and services from the markdown.

code_variants.CODE_0A:
open_tab('https://www.inkers.ai')
wait(2)
snapshot_0a = get_session_snapshot(True, True)
return {"snapshot_0a": snapshot_0a}
code_variants.CODE_0B:
open_tab('https://www.inkers.ai')
wait(2)
interactive_elements_0b = get_interactive_elements('Demo', True, True)
return {"interactive_elements_0b": interactive_elements_0b}
code_variants.CODE_0C:
open_tab('https://www.inkers.ai')
wait(2)
page_structure_0c = get_enhanced_page_structure()
return {"page_structure_0c": page_structure_0c}

summarizer_snapshots.summary_output:
Inkers.ai provides AI-powered solutions for the construction industry. Their key products and services include:

**Core Features:**

*   **4D BIM (BIM with Timelines):** Integrates the construction process with 2D and 3D measurements linked to project timelines for detailed documentation and progress tracking.
*   **Snag List:** Highlights clashes and deviations using color-coded 3D textures and AI-powered snag lists.
*   **Project Milestones:** Automates tracking of deliverables, quantities, timelines, and traceability.
*   **Scan to BIM:** Converts point cloud data into Revit models.
*   **Thermals Analytics:** Incorporates thermal texture models to analyze moisture levels.
*   **Deviation Analysis:** Compares as-built 3D models with BIM designs.

**Next Generation Construction AI:**

*   **Defects AI:** Detects 15 construction defects in real-time.
*   **Mesh Segmentation AI:** Segments meshes into 10 IFC classes.
*   **Objects AI:** Identifies over 35 site objects.
*   **Health & Safety AI:** Uses facial recognition for real-time attendance, safety, and unknown person reports.

**Other Features:**

*   **Automated Milestones and Scheduling:** Tracks, manages, and executes construction projects.
*   **Real-time Tracking:** Monitors construction progress with automated milestone tracking.
*   **Smart Scheduling:** AI-powered scheduling optimization.
*   **BIM Integration:** Integrates with existing BIM models.
*   **Analytics Dashboard:** Provides analytics and insights for data-driven decisions.

Inkers.ai offers tiered pricing plans for Owners & Contractors, Architects, and Lithic Scanner, with options for Lite, Basic, and Plus packages.

session.final_summary:
Inkers.ai provides AI-powered solutions for the construction industry. Their key products and services include:

**Core Features:**

*   **4D BIM (BIM with Timelines):** Integrates the construction process with 2D and 3D measurements linked to project timelines for detailed documentation and progress tracking.
*   **Snag List:** Highlights clashes and deviations using color-coded 3D textures and AI-powered snag lists.
*   **Project Milestones:** Automates tracking of deliverables, quantities, timelines, and traceability.
*   **Scan to BIM:** Converts point cloud data into Revit models.
*   **Thermals Analytics:** Incorporates thermal texture models to analyze moisture levels.
*   **Deviation Analysis:** Compares as-built 3D models with BIM designs.

**Next Generation Construction AI:**

*   **Defects AI:** Detects 15 construction defects in real-time.
*   **Mesh Segmentation AI:** Segments meshes into 10 IFC classes.
*   **Objects AI:** Identifies over 35 site objects.
*   **Health & Safety AI:** Uses facial recognition for real-time attendance, safety, and unknown person reports.

**Other Features:**

*   **Automated Milestones and Scheduling:** Tracks, manages, and executes construction projects.
*   **Real-time Tracking:** Monitors construction progress with automated milestone tracking.
*   **Smart Scheduling:** AI-powered scheduling optimization.
*   **BIM Integration:** Integrates with existing BIM models.
*   **Analytics Dashboard:** Provides analytics and insights for data-driven decisions.

Inkers.ai offers tiered pricing plans for Owners & Contractors, Architects, and Lithic Scanner, with options for Lite, Basic, and Plus packages.

final_summary:
Inkers.ai provides AI-powered solutions for the construction industry. Their key products and services include:

**Core Features:**

*   **4D BIM (BIM with Timelines):** Integrates the construction process with 2D and 3D measurements linked to project timelines for detailed documentation and progress tracking.
*   **Snag List:** Highlights clashes and deviations using color-coded 3D textures and AI-powered snag lists.
*   **Project Milestones:** Automates tracking of deliverables, quantities, timelines, and traceability.
*   **Scan to BIM:** Converts point cloud data into Revit models.
*   **Thermals Analytics:** Incorporates thermal texture models to analyze moisture levels.
*   **Deviation Analysis:** Compares as-built 3D models with BIM designs.

**Next Generation Construction AI:**

*   **Defects AI:** Detects 15 construction defects in real-time.
*   **Mesh Segmentation AI:** Segments meshes into 10 IFC classes.
*   **Objects AI:** Identifies over 35 site objects.
*   **Health & Safety AI:** Uses facial recognition for real-time attendance, safety, and unknown person reports.

**Other Features:**

*   **Automated Milestones and Scheduling:** Tracks, manages, and executes construction projects.
*   **Real-time Tracking:** Monitors construction progress with automated milestone tracking.
*   **Smart Scheduling:** AI-powered scheduling optimization.
*   **BIM Integration:** Integrates with existing BIM models.
*   **Analytics Dashboard:** Provides analytics and insights for data-driven decisions.

Inkers.ai offers tiered pricing plans for Owners & Contractors, Architects, and Lithic Scanner, with options for Lite, Basic, and Plus packages.
